ibis.io
Class DeepCopy

java.lang.Object
  ibis.io.IOProperties
      ibis.io.DeepCopy
All Implemented Interfaces:
Constants
public class DeepCopy
extends IOProperties

Exports a single static method that creates a deep copy of any serializable object.
